name: Lost Pieces
description:
Inspired by great games such as Super Metroid and Megaman X, Lost Pieces is an action platformer with multiple characters and one big map to explore.

ControlsKeyboard 1
  • WASD: Move
  • Space: Jump
  • J: Fire
  • L: Special ability
Keyboard 2
  • Arrow keys: Move
  • Space: Jump
  • Z: Fire
  • X: Special ability
XBox 360 Controller
  • Left stick: Move
  • A: Jump
  • X: Fire
  • Right trigger: Special ability
